column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////This was our preferred touristy pizza place (compared to the other touristy pizza place that rhymes with "too much cheesedanos").  The crust was buttery
column2: there was the right amount of cheese on top
column3: and the sauce tasted really fresh.  We ate in the late afternoon
column4: so we were looking for a stopgap between landing in Chicago and dinner
column5: but it's as a great fill for us
column6: and we wish we had more time to eat another meal here.
